meanings.definition: Superdiplomats: highly skilled negotiators who excel in international relations.
meanings.sent1: The superdiplomats successfully resolved the conflict between the two countries.
meanings.sent2: The world leaders sought the advice of the superdiplomats to reach a peaceful agreement.
meanings.sent3: The superdiplomats managed to turn a tense situation into a friendly discussion.
meanings.sent4: The superdiplomats' ability to navigate complex negotiations was like watching a master chess player.
meanings.sent5: The image of the superdiplomats shaking hands and smiling lingered in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: Superdiplomats: individuals with exceptional diplomatic abilities and expertise.
meanings.sent1: She was known as one of the superdiplomats for her calm demeanor in tense situations.
meanings.sent2: The superdiplomats' advice was crucial in maintaining peace among nations.
meanings.sent3: The superdiplomats' knack for diffusing conflicts with humor was truly impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to find common ground with anyone made her a true superdiplomat.
meanings.sent5: The superdiplomats' reputation for resolving disputes quickly spread far and wide.

meanings.definition: Superdiplomats: a group of top diplomats known for their exceptional diplomatic skills.
meanings.sent1: The superdiplomats gathered to discuss the upcoming peace talks.
meanings.sent2: The world recognized the superdiplomats as the best in their field.
meanings.sent3: The superdiplomats' secret weapon was their ability to listen attentively.
meanings.sent4: The superdiplomats' unity and cooperation set them apart from others.
meanings.sent5: The superdiplomats' impact on global politics was undeniable.
